channel.title: BrawlScape - old style economy server
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7]BrawlScape[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Website link: [URL=http://brawlscape.net/]Forums[/URL][/SIZE][SIZE=4] Download: [URL=http://brawlscape.net/BrawlScape.jar]Start playing[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
BrawlScape is a oldschool type of a private server. BrawlScape has a well-built economy. The server is great for bossing and skilling and in the future pking. Experience rates are challenging - not too fast or too slow. Items are mainly obtained through monster killing and skilling instead of buying everything from shops thus making economy really stable and interesting.
[SIZE=5]Other major features[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Really stable server - based on Hyperion. [*]Many working skills [*]Working ladders and doors [*]Well designed base - everything needed is near [*]Perfected and tested combat system [*]Unique minigames [*]Everything is clipped as they should be [*]Great bosses and more to come![/ul]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cq7aSnm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vfbTHyv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KqnP35T.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/67HSWMM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GhNrNWE.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://brawlscape.net/"]Website[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
